_comment: The check is: pick the first override whose number is not larger than the hashcode of the species
Therefor it is important to make sure the largest entry is at the bottom of this list
Because the order of the entries in the override list in-code go from bottom-to-top

overrides._comment: Only exists because the vanilla default value is 0 and would therefor apply to the potential lower values (like the one above)
Only exists to be compatible with earlier versions - remove in 1.22
